name: Extreme Levels
description: Some fun challenging levels to try

levels.name: Reverse
levels.description: Reverse the order of letters in the word

levels.name: Unary to Binary
levels.description: Convert the unary number to a binary number

levels.name: Binary Addition
levels.description: Output the result of the binary addition

levels.name: Switch First / Last
levels.description: Switch the first letter and last letter in the word

levels.name: Remove the Center
levels.description:
Remove the middle letter from the string

The string will always be an odd length

winMessage:
You rock! I can't believe you solved all of the extreme puzzles.

Now try to build your own level pack with even harder levels...
